pageProduct.name: Opsite Post-Op 6.5cm x 5cm 5 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

A waterproof film with a low-adherent pad

Warnings

For single use only. Sterile unless individual pouches opened or damaged.
As with all adhesive products, apply and remove carefully from sensitive or fragile skin.
Seek medical advice immediately for all serious wounds and burns, or if redness or discomfort occurs.

Common Uses

A waterproof film with a low-adherent pad. Absorbent, shower-proof and bacteria proof.

Directions

Peel off clear plastic backing once dressing is placed on wound. To remove Opsite Post-op, lift one corner and slowly stretch outwards from the pad so the film will lift easily. Ideal for everyday use as can be worn while showering.
